name: officedev-teamsfx-samples-tab-hello-world-tab-docker
title: Containerized Tab App with Azure Backend
shortDescription: A containerized Hello World app of Microsoft Teams Tab app which has a backend service.
longDescription: This is a containerized Hello World app of Microsoft Teams Tab app which accomplishes very simple function like single-sign on. You can run this app locally in Docker or deploy it to Microsoft Azure container service. This app has a Tab frontend and a backend service using Azure Function.

thumbnails.alt: Tab App with Azure Backend in Docker

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
